All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Bill
    This class represents the bill of a payment, including number of days (weekend/non-weekend) stayed, room price, service price, tax, promotion and total amount needed to be paid.
    CancelCheckInReservationException
    When trying to cancel a CheckedInReservation.
    CashPayment
    This class represents cash payments that Guest makes, implementing the Payable interface.
    CheckedInReservation
    This subclass represents checked-in reservations which are created when guest of a confirmed reservation checked-in.
    CheckedOutReservation
    This subclass represents checked-out reservations which are created when guest of a checked-in reservation checked out.
    CheckOutController
    The controller that handles the checking out process, including checking out guest(s), requesting payment and generating the bill(s).
    CheckOutGuestContactNotFoundException
    When trying to check out a non-existing guest.
    CheckOutGuestNameNotFoundException
    When trying to check out a guest whose name does not exist in system.
    CheckOutUI
    This class is used for displaying the UI when checking out and making payments.
    ConfirmedReservation
    This subclass represents confirm reservations which are created when a pending reservation is confirmed with check-in/check-out time and room number.
    CreditCard
    This class represents a credit card entity.
    CreditCardPayment
    This class represents credit card payment method implementing the Payable interface.
    DuplicateMenuItemException
    When trying to create a menu item whose name already exists in the menu.
    EmptyMenuItemDescriptionException
    When trying to create a menu item with empty description.
    EmptyMenuNameException
    When trying to create a menu item with empty name.
    ExpiredReservation
    This subclass represents expired reservations which are created from pending/confirmed reservations when the guest did not check in by a specific time period after the desired/confirmed check-in time.
    Guest
    This class represents guests with information including name, gender, address, country, nationality, contact info, credit card info, id number and type.
    GuestController
    This class contains a container for all guests and all methods for guest-related operations, including creating, searching, and updating guests' information.
    GuestUI
    This class is used for displaying UI when doing operations relating guests, including registering new guests, update guests' details, find a particular guest by contact number.
    HRPS
    The class that contains the UI and the only main() method that runs the app.
    HRPSException
    The super class of all the exceptions defined by HRPS program.
    ID
    This class represents an ID.
    IDType
    All accepted types of a guest ID.
    IllegalBedTypeException
    This exception is thrown when the user input an illegal bed type.
    IllegalChangeOfDateException
    When trying to change a check-in/check-out date that cannot be changed (eg.
    IllegalRoomInSerializableBinaryFileException
    When trying to remove a non-existent CheckedInReservation.
    IllegalRoomTypeException
    This exception is thrown when the user input an illegal room type.
    InvalidCheckOutTimeException
    When trying to set a check-out time that is before the associated check-in time.
    InvalidDatePairException
    When trying to set a check-in time that is after the associated check-out time.
    InvalidDateTimeFormatException
    When trying to enter a date time input not in format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm or the entered date time input does not exist (eg 2022-02-30 12:00).
    InvalidInputChoiceException
    This exception is thrown when the user enters an invalid input choice.
    InvalidOrderedMenuItemQuantityException
    When trying to enter a non-positive menu item quantity.
    InvalidPriceException
    When trying to enter a negative menu item price.
    InvalidRoomNumberFormatException
    When trying to enter a room number not in format xx-xx, where x is a decimal digit.
    InvalidRoomNumberUpdateException
    When trying to update a room number, which by policy is non-updatable.
    InvalidRoomTypeException
    When trying to enter a non-existent room type.
    InvalidStatusChangeException
    Exception thrown when a status change in reservation is invalid.
    Menu
    This class represents menus which can be used to add, remove and choose service items.
    MenuController
    This class represent controller that contains all methods related to menu, includes creating new menu items, searching, updating and removing existed menu items, and also update the menu and the menu items on the database.
    MenuItem
    This class represents menu items that can be ordered by guest.
    MenuItemNotExistException
    When trying to enter a non-existent menu item's name.
    NegativeNumberException
    When trying to enter a negative number.
    OrderController
    This class represents the controller for room service orders, includes create, update, search for orders and calculate prices of orders.
    OrderedMenuItem
    This subclass represents an order of menu item which consists of the menu item type and the quantity.
    OrderedRoomService
    This class represents room service's order which contains one or many orders of menu items.
    OrderStatus
    All status of a menu order.
    Parser
    This class is used for getting and checking input from users.
    Payable
    Implementing this interface allows the class to be accepted as a valid payment by the HRPS system.
    Reservation
    This class represents an abstraction of a reservation, including check-in/checkout time, numbers of adults/children, the guest who made the reservation and the room number wished to be booked.
    ReservationController
    This class represents a controller for reservations, includes create, update, search and remove reservations from the system.
    ReservationUI
    This class is used for displaying the UI when making reservation, including creating (includes walk-in), updating, removing and printing reservations.
    Room
    This class represents rooms in the hotel, with attributes room number, room type, bed type, facing direction, status of vacancy, has wi-fi? is smoking-free?, rate per day and the currently staying guest.
    RoomBedType
    All types of a room's bed.
    RoomController
    This class represents controller for rooms, includes creating new rooms or initializing rooms from database, searching, updating and checking-in guests to rooms.
    RoomFacing
    All types of a room facing direction.
    RoomNumberNotExistException
    When trying to enter a non-existent room number.
    RoomStatus
    All types of a room's status.
    RoomType
    All types of a room.
    RoomUI
    This class is used for displaying UI for creating and finding preferred rooms (based on room type, bed type, room facing direction, smoking/non-smoking), getting and updating room details.
    SerializeDB
    SerializeDB is a class that serializes data to a file and deserializes data from a file.
    ServiceUI
    This class is used for displaying UI for displaying and updating room service menu, making orders as well as checking and updating the status of the orders.
    UI
    This class is the main UI used for interacting with hotel managers through text command line.
    WaitListReservation
    This subclass represents pending reservations which are first created when a guest made a reservation and needed to be confirmed on check-in/check-out time and room number.
